pfQuest.descr: A lightweight quest, spawn and item database

pfUI.descr: A complete and minimal UI framework

ShaguKill.descr: Displays the remaining kills till level up

ShaguMount.descr: Automatically unmounts the player when using an action

ShaguNotify.descr: Shows achievement alike notifications for several events

ShaguScore.descr: Displays a gearscore alike item rating

ShaguStance.descr: Automatically switches to the required stance

ShaguValue.descr: Displays item sell and buy values on tooltips

GMBlacklist.descr: Helps GMs on cutting and blacklisting chat messages

ShaguJWC.descr: Some Eye-candy for your JWC gambling

ShaguBoat.descr: A despawn timer for Turtle-WoW Fishing Boats

antispam.descr: A low-effort spam filter for turtle-wow

Bagnon.descr: Bagnon is a bag replacement addon designed to help the player find items as quickly and as easily as possible
